About the Campuses

The University of Toronto has three campuses to include the University of Toronto Mississauga (UTM), The University of Toronto’s St. George campus, and the University of Toronto Scarborough (UTSC).

How to Apply for the University of Toronto.

  • Visit https://future.utoronto.ca
  • Click Apply
  • Choose desired Program
  • Follow Application Instructions

See Also: Admission Requirement for Admission into Canadian High School

  • Application Deadline:
  • Deadlines to Submit Supporting Documentation
  • OUAC 101 Applicants

Admission decisions for Ontario secondary school (OUAC 101) applicants will be released between January and late May.

February 1 is the deadline for receipt of transcripts and, if required, English facility test scores. As some offers of admission may be made before February 1, applicants are encouraged to apply early and submit any required documentation well in advance of this date. Late documents will be considered as space allows.

Please note that the “early recommended dates” specified in the table below do not impact consideration of OUAC 101 applications. All Ontario Secondary School applicants are treated equally during the assessment process so long as their supporting documents are received by the normal deadlines set out below.

Program Area Supplementary Application Deadline
Applied Science and Engineering† Online Student Profile due February 1 (early recommend date: December 15)
International Foundation Program – Applied Science and Engineering† Online Student Profile due February 15 (early recommend date: December 15)
Architecture, Landscape, and Design† One Idea Supplementary Application due January 27
International Foundation Program – Architecture, Landscape, and Design† One Idea Supplementary Application due January 27 (Extended to February 15)
Faculty of Arts and Science, U of T St. George† Rotman Commerce: Rotman Commerce Supplementary Application due February 1 (early recommended date: December 10)

Computer Science: Computer Science Supplementary Application due February 1 (early recommended date: December 10)
Kinesiology and Physical Education Statement of Interest due March 15
Music† Music Questionnaire due January 11 (extended to January 22)
U of T Mississauga N/A€
U of T Scarborough Supplementary Application Form (SAF) due March 15 (early recommended date: Mayember 15 for co-op Management and International Business and Co-op International Development Studies)

All Other Applicants

Admission decisions are released between mid-December and late May.  The earliest rounds of consideration will take place before the February document deadline. Applicants who submit documentation early are able to maximize their opportunities for admission consideration. Documents received after the February deadline will be considered as space allows.

Supplementary applications can only be submitted after a student has applied to the program area.

International Foundation Program – Applied Science and Engineering† February 1 (Extended to February 15) Online Student Profile due February 15 (early recommend date: December 1)
Architecture, Landscape, and Design† February 1 One Idea Supplementary Application due January 27

Faculty of Arts and Science, U of T St. George† February 1 Rotman Commerce: Rotman Commerce Supplementary Application due February 1 (early recommended date: December 10)

Computer Science: Computer Science Supplementary Application due February 1 (early recommended date: December 10)
Bachelor of Information May 15 Supplementary Application due May 15
Kinesiology and Physical Education February 1 (Extended to March 15) Statement of Interest due February 1 (Extended to March 15)
Kinesiology and Physical Education February 1 (Extended to June 11 for INTERNAL Application only) Statement of Interest due February 1 (Extended to June 11 for INTERNAL Application only)
Music† February 1 Music Questionnaire due January 11 (Extended to January 22)
